item.description:
Since Gracies is closed on Monday this week I have rescheduled the Gracie's meetup.

Providence's Restaurant Week will be held this summer from July 6th through July 19th. You can enjoy a special prix fixe 3 course lunch menu for just $12.95 and a 3 course dinner menu for just $29.95 [not including tax, tip, or drink].

This is a great deal to try the more upscale restaurants.

Check out Gracie's dinner menu at http://www.restreview...

You do not have to order off the restaurant week menu!

http://www.graciespro... is Gracie's official web site.

Please RSVP by 7/15 so I can make reservations.
item.how_to_find_us: Reservations will be made under Newcomers Meetup
item.name: Prov Rest. Wk - Gracie's Rescheduled
